name: monospace-web-theme
author: Cameron K. Brooks <cambrooks3393@gmail.com> (https://www.cameronbrooks.net/)
description: A pure‚ÄêCSS + JS monospace grid theme for any static site

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: concat-cli -f src/fonts.css src/reset.css src/theme.css -o dist/monospace.css && postcss dist/monospace.css -o dist/monospace.min.css
scripts.build:js: babel src/script.js -o dist/monospace.js && terser dist/monospace.js -o dist/monospace.min.js
